game.name: Game Corp DX
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Manage your Game Studio, earn big bucks, impress the critics, beat rival studios and clean up at the awards!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Manage your Game Studio, earn big bucks, impress the critics, beat rival studios and clean up at the awards!

reviewHighlights.text: Fun game, not a massive game (duh, $3) but I think it's worth the price. Only complaint is people moving too often to get food/water disrupting everyo...
